original_text: The people of Dan worshipped Micah's idol. Jonathan served as priest for the tribe of Dan. He was a descendant of Moses' son, Gershom. He and his descendants served there as priests until Israel's enemies took them away into exile.
korean_text: 단 자손이 자기들을 위하여 그 새긴 신상을 세웠고 모세의 손자요 게르솜의 아들인 요나단과 그의 자손은 단 지파의 제사장이 되어 그 땅 백성이 사로잡히는 날까지 이르렀더라

sentences.original_text: The people of Dan worshipped Micah's idol
sentences.korean_translation: 단 지파 사람들은 미가의 우상을 숭배했다

sentences.original_text: Jonathan served as priest for the tribe of Dan
He was a descendant of Moses' son, Gershom
He and his descendants served there as priests
sentences.korean_translation: 그와 그의 후손들은 그곳에서 제사장으로 섬겼다

sentences.original_text: until Israel's enemies took them away into exile
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘의 적들이 그들을 포로로 잡아갈 때까지
